channel.title: Gamedev on GameAndCode
channel.description: Recent content in Gamedev on GameAndCode

item.title: GameDev mind map
item.description:
Special announcement

I am pleased to announce that a Discord server now exists. I would be happy to meet a few people. You can expect the latest game dev news and resources. Get feedback for your projects or just talk about games. I will also post news about my upcoming games. You will also be one of the first to get the chance to test them.
